member.name: T:Grpc.AspNetCore.ClientFactory.ContextPropagationInterceptor
member.summary: Interceptor that will set the current request's cancellation token and deadline onto CallOptions. The interceptor gets the request from IHttpContextAccessor, which is a singleton. IHttpContextAccessor uses an async local value.

member.name: T:Grpc.AspNetCore.ClientFactory.GrpcContextPropagationOptions
member.summary: Options used to configure gRPC call context propagation.

member.name: P:Grpc.AspNetCore.ClientFactory.GrpcContextPropagationOptions.SuppressContextNotFoundErrors
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value that determines if context not found errors are suppressed.
When , the client will thrown an error if it is unable to find a call context when propagating values to a gRPC call. Otherwise, the error is suppressed and the gRPC call will be made without context propagation.

remarks.para: Call context propagation will error by default if propagation can't happen because the call context wasn't found. This typically happens when a client is used outside the context of an executing gRPC service.
Suppressing context not found errors allows a client with propagation enabled to be used outside the context of an executing gRPC service.

member.name: M:Grpc.Shared.ArgumentNullThrowHelper.ThrowIfNull(System.Object,System.String)
member.param: The reference type argument to validate as non-null.
The name of the parameter with which corresponds.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.GrpcServerHttpClientBuilderExtensions.EnableCallContextPropagation(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IHttpClientBuilder)
